transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hello. Ha IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu kya main head office se aap se baat hui thi na sorry main aapko connect nahi kar payi thi abhi baat ho sakti hai sir?
Boliye boliye mam.
Ji. Thik hai sir us time aapki voice bhi thodi si clear nahi thi to samajh nahi aa raha tha kya baat ho rahi thi. A sir to mujhe bataiyega problem kahan pe aa rahi hai humne matlab aapne feedback bhi humko one diya tha to kahan problem aa rahi hai hume sir?
Abhi. A shayad maine kal bhi bataya usse pehle bhi ek person ka call aaya tha unko bataya okay aur subah bhi maine aapko yahi baat batai ki jaise for example ek five ka product hum consider karte hai bar bending bar cutting suspended platform training plotter.
Okay to ye in products ka jab requirement aata hai matlab koi IndiaMART pe search kar raha hai search karne ke baad inquiry to aa rahi hai IndiaMART pe ha to hume notification bhi aa raha hai.
Notification aane ke baad jaise hi hum click karte hai na click karne ke baad wo product ka inquiry hi nahi dikhai de raha hai.
Okay aur hamare. Hamare bande matlab hamare yahan pe jo team hai to humne bhi cross check kiya.
Inquiry dala inquiry dalne ke baad wo inquiry a matlab IndiaMART pe to aayi.
IndiaMART pe aane ke baad humne purchase karne try kiya wo inquiry hum purchase hi nahi kar paye.
But baki logon ka unko call aa raha hai.
Baki logon ke pass unka call aa raha hai.
Ha.
Sir to by lead ek alag cheez hoti hai ki by lead aapko aa rahi hai aur wo khatam ho ja rahi hai call to ek alag cheez hoti hai wo to customer aapka catalog dekhta hai us basis pe wo aapko call karta hai.
Call nahi mam by lead by lead purchase karte hai na inquiry hum. Hmm.
Ha wo wala.
Achha thik hai matlab aapko lead dikh rahi hai uski notification alert to jarur aa raha hai aapko thik hai but jab aap consume karne ja rahe hain to aapko wo by lead nahi mil rahi hai. Ye kehna chah rahe hain sir? Thank you for your interest bol raha hai ha correct thank you for your interest bolta hai ya fir already by lead consumed aise kuch bolta hai magar jaise inquiry aata hai immediately agar main tabhi purchase karu to bhi waise hi aa raha hai.
To thank you for your interest to sir aayega na tabhi to wo by lead aapki consume ho rahi hai tabhi to likh ke aata hai thank you for your interest.
Mam by lead aa hi nahi raha hai wo lead hi convert nahi ho raha hai aaya samajh mein.
Matlab convert matlab by lead consume kar rahe hain uske baad convert nahi ho raha hai ya us nahi ho raha hai. Achha to problem kya hai problem hai. Kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Sir ek second main samajhna chah rahi hu. Just one second sir just one second problem ye hai ki hume notification aa rahi hai to hum jab us by lead ko khol rahe hain to by lead consume nahi ho pa rahi hai khatam ho ja rahi hai ya problem ye hai ki hum by lead to consume kar le rahe hain but hum usko convert nahi ho pa rahi hai.
Dekhiye abhi situation bolta hu by lead dekhiye maine click kiya okay click karne ke baad by lead ka detail dikhna chahiye.
Ha. Dikhta hi nahi hai wo by lead consume bhi nahi matlab yahan ha boliye boliye.
Ha to by lead manager mein aapne check kiya sir kyunki jaise hi aap consume karte hain us lead ko to aapke lead manager mein add ho jata hai.
Wo consume hi nahi ho raha hai mam.
Consume nahi ho pa raha hai ye problem hai. For example. For example mere notification mein aa gaya roller paver requirement okay maine wo roller paver ka notification ko click kiya.
Barabar. Hmm. Ha ji. Okay contact to buyer karne ke baad wahan pe detail dikhna chahiye okay wo contact to buyer ko click karne ke baad wo by lead convert hi nahi ho raha hai matlab wo yahi nahi ho raha hai wo contact hi nahi show kar raha hai wo wahan pe bolta hai ki ek to you are too late or before one.
Okay. Thik hai. To problem ye hai sir ki hume lead hi nahi mil pa rahi hai hume dikh rahi hai but hum consume karne ja rahe hain to khatam ho ja rahi hai wo.
Right. Hello.
Ha to problem ye hai ki sir hum catalog mein hume by lead to upar notification dikh rahi hai.
But hum consume karne ja rahe hain to wo consume nahi ho pa rahi hai kyunki wo khatam ho ja rahi hai right. Thik hai sir ab main batati hu aap kya karo thik hai ek to aap aao video meet pe aap video meet pe kab aa sakte ho sir?
A abhi main ek to drive kar raha hu.
Thik hai kitne ghante mein aap aa sakte hain kab tak aa sakte hain sir system pe? Matlab usme kya karna hai?
Aapka ek to settings mein kuch changes karwane hain sir mujhe. Aapke andar. Thik hai. Sir hume access nahi hota aur hume allowed bhi nahi hota hai aapka account aise wo karne ka. To aap change karna usme boliye.
Usme sir aapko na system se karna hoga system pe dikhega aapko usme usme ek inquiries ka aa raha hoga ek answered ka aa raha hoga ek alert ka aa raha hoga wo mujhe aapka active karwana hai.
Thik hai dusri cheez sir ab aap please aise. Wo cheez. Nahi nahi nahi wo system se ho payega sir.
System se hi hoga. Thik hai wo system se fir wo baad mein hona padega ha. Thik hai aap aaiyega to mujhe call kar lijiyega dusri cheez sir kya keh rahi hu ki aap ek bar na lead jaise hi ab aapko aaye na sir to ek bar na aap uska na screen record karke hume bhej do. Thik hai. Sir mobile. Abhi aaj hogi kal ho sakta hai parso bhi ho sakta hai aisa kabhi bhi ho sakta hai to aap jab bhi by lead aise dekhe to screen recorder open kar lo aur usi time aap usko hume share kar do to hum ek bar fir aage apni jo team hai technical wali unko hum share karenge aur aap hume teen char aise dijiyega tab ja ke hum samples unko share karenge ki aisa aapke sath ho raha hai. Thik hai. Thik hai. Ha fir uske baad main aapka ye rectify karwati hu problem se. Thik hai. Ek bar aap system pe aaiye to mujhe call kariyega thik hai abhi sir aapne na not satisfied kar diya tha to main ek bar isko close karti hu aap ek bar sir please yes kar dijiyega aur aap mujhe direct call kar lijiyega main. Not satisfied tha okay hum kya karte hain aap mujhe evening mein call to kal hum call schedule karte hain okay mujhe proper answer milta hai to fir hum aapka appreciation tha no problem.
Ji nahi sir uske liye to dekhiye aapka jo samples honge wo aapko mujhe share karne padenge to wo ek din mein to samples aayega nahi wo at least teen char din lagega aapko. Aayega aayega din mein din mein kam se kam teen char inquiry to kam se kam aise hoti hai.
Achha thik hai aap ek bar mujhe. Main aapko deta hu. Aap mujhe ek bar share kariye to main ek bar aapko sham ko call karti hu sir. Thik hai. Thik hai mam chaliye okay. Thik okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to purchase buyleads on IndiaMART.

- Notification received, but inquiry not visible.

- Others receiving calls for the same buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to come on video meet.

- Executive asked to share screen recordings of buyleads.

- Executive will share samples with technical team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share screen recordings.

- Executive will call back in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, technical issue, screen recording, video meet
